comments.raw_text: This is for addressing bug 618975 review comments for renaming viewport frames as scroll frames, because a viewport has a different meaning.
comments.text: This is for addressing bug 618975 review comments for renaming viewport frames as scroll frames, because a viewport has a different meaning.
comments.creator: ben@stechz.com
comments.author: ben@stechz.com

comments.raw_text: We already have scroll frames, no?  (And also already have viewport frames, which do mean viewports.)
comments.text: We already have scroll frames, no?  (And also already have viewport frames, which do mean viewports.)
comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu

comments.raw_text:
Sorry, to be more precise, there are specific places in bug 618975 where I call scroll frames viewport frames.

See:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=618975#c14
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=618975#c20
